titles.title: A resolution recognizing the exemplary service of the soldiers of the 30th Infantry Division (Old Hickory) of the United States Army during World War I and World War II.
A resolution recognizing the exemplary service of the soldiers of the 30th Infantry Division (Old Hickory) of the United States Army during World War I and World War II.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the exemplary service of the soldiers of the 30th Infantry Division of the Army during World War I and World War II.
